data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira blows against Santa Clara's Carlos Carvalho for offside.
The match at Estadio Capital do Movel has been interrupted briefly for a check on Carlos Carvalho, who is down injured.
Santa Clara's Carlos Carvalho is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 6, In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pacos Ferreira drive forward but Joao Amaral is judged offside.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Carlos Carvalho (Santa Clara) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 13, Free kick in a good position for Santa Clara!
In Pacos de Ferreira, Carlos Carvalho of Santa Clara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Santa Clara are coming forward and Anderson Carvalho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 16, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Free kick Santa Clara.
Pacos Ferreira push forward at Estadio Capital do Movel and Joao Amaral gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santa Clara defence.
In the minute 18, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Oleg Reabciuk gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Santa Clara defender.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 26, Oleg Reabciuk for Pacos Ferreira is whistled offside.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Douglas Tanque of Pacos Ferreira is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 29, Santa Clara's Thiago Santana is on target but unsuccessful.
Douglas Tanque of Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 32, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Luther Singh (Pacos Ferreira) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 33, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 35, Oleg Reabciuk scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio Capital do Movel.
That's a fine assist from Luther Singh.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 40, Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh has run offside.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 42, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Anderson Carvalho (Santa Clara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Osama Rashid fires in a strike for Santa Clara.
In the minute 45, Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Lincoln is replacing Rafael Ramos for the away team.
Pierre Sagna is replacing Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis for Santa Clara at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Luther Singh gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 50, Fabio Cardoso (Santa Clara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in high up the field for Pacos Ferreira in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira, Bruno Costa of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Pacos Ferreira's Joao Amaral gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Santa Clara defender.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 57, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Carlos Carvalho of Santa Clara is pulled up for offside.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Luiz Carlos attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santa Clara's Thiago Santana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 62, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Daniel Ramos (Santa Clara) is making a third substitution, with Shahriar Moghanloo replacing Carlos Carvalho.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Capital do Movel with Costinha replacing Anderson Carvalho.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 66, Joao Amaral for the home team is judged to be offside.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oleg Reabciuk is booked for the home team.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Joao Amaral with Helder Ferreira. This is the first substitution made today by Pepa.
Pacos Ferreira make their second substitution with Mohamed Diaby replacing Bruno Costa.
Thiago Santana (Santa Clara) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 69, Pierre Sagna instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Goal! Pacos Ferreira have got their heads in front thanks to a Douglas Tanque strike.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Pacos Ferreira's Helder Ferreira has run offside.
In the minute 77, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 79, Marcelo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Thiago Santana for Santa Clara has been booked by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
Uilton is replacing Luther Singh for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 81, Marcelo is back on the pitch.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Ramos (Santa Clara) is making a fifth substitution, with Ukra replacing Osama Rashid.
In the minute 83, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mohamed Diaby (Pacos Ferreira) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Pepa is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Capital do Movel with Dor Jan replacing Douglas Tanque.
In Pacos de Ferreira Pacos Ferreira attack through Helder Ferreira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Santa Clara are pushing forward but Salomao's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Salomao gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santa Clara.
In the minute 89, Shahriar Moghanloo of Santa Clara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Pacos de Ferreira.
Fernando Fonseca is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
Santa Clara pushes forward through Thiago Santana, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Santa Clara.
Pierre Sagna for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fernando Fonseca.
